title: Fanghunters
description: With vampires threatening our very existence, it's the Fanghunters that take them down. One-by-one...  On the run from the savage, blood-sucking creatures that held him captive and still want him dead, Dominic Dempsey begins to fight back, slaying the vampires that are enslaving innocent victims.  When mysterious billionaire, Vincent Beauchamp, hires him to slay the vampire responsible for his daughter's demise, Dom begins the ultimate hunt. As he nears his target, the danger intensifies, putting his life on the line. Now, he must enter into the most dangerous fight of his life.  And for what? Does Beauchamp have a bigger agenda than Dom ever realized?
author: Leo  Romero
